DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The purpose current randomize clinical trial compare effectiveness dry needle versus myofascial release therapy myofascial trigger point ( MTrPs ) cervical muscle , quality life , fatigue , quality sleep , anxiety depression patient fibromyalgia syndrome ( FMS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes After Dry Needling Cervical Muscles , Quality Life , Patients With Fibromyalgia Syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Design : A single-blind randomized control trial conduct patient FMS . Methods : Sixty-four subject FMS randomly assign experimental group receive dry needling therapy , control group myofascial release therapy trigger point active latent follow pair muscle : occipital , splenius capitis , sternocleidomastoid , scalene , trapezius , supraspinatus , infraspinatus , multifidus . Myofascial trigger point , quality life , impact fibromyalgia symptom , quality sleep , intensity pain , anxiety level , state depression , impact fatigue record baseline four week treatment .
DOC.criteria: Fibromyalgia syndrome diagnosis . Aged 18 60 year . No regular physical activity . Limitation usual activity due pain least 1 day previous 30 day . Agreement attend evening therapy session Receipt pharmacologic therapy . Presence cardiac , renal hepatic insufficiency . Severe physical disability . Comorbid condition ( eg , inflammatory disease ) . Infection fever . Hypotension . Skin alteration . Psychiatric illness . Previous history surgery .
